name: 恋爱公寓（My Girl：Love Story）
description:
Love Story game made with Real girl videos.
Date with a co-rented Student which performed by famous actress and model.
Strat a new life with the accompany of your dream girl.

Game Features
1- HD Videos
More than 156 video clips bring you a fantastic love story;
Professional actress and real scene.

2- First perspective
All the videos are shoot with first perspective;
Players can easily immerse in the story.

3- Creative Plot
All the plots were created by famous writers.
Creative and realistic plot will give you a wonderful Asian love story.
